channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump-Harris election may take weeks to decide. Here‚Äôs what investors must know.
item.description: Election Day is supposed to be a one-day affair, but if polls and recent history are a guide, the results of the Nov. 5 presidential race and key congressional contests may not be known for days or even weeks.

item.title: Apple commits $1.5 billion to Globalstar for expanded iPhone satellite services
item.description: Apple committed about $1.5 billion to satellite communications company Globalstar to fund the expansion of iPhone services.

item.title: Higher taxes will make it harder for Britain to build 'the next Nvidia,' tech execs say
item.description: Startup founders and investors slammed capital gains tax hikes in the U.K., saying it would make it harder for the country to succeed as a global tech hub.

item.title: ISM factory index drops, marking 7th straight month below growth threshold
item.description: The malaise that has loomed over the manufacturing sector for the better part of the past two years seems like it will continue, according to one economist.

item.title: Marc Benioff is in talks to sell Time to Antenna Group
item.description: Benioff acquired Time in 2018 for $190 million. Early talks to sell to Antenna have centered around a price of $150 million, according to a person familiar.

item.title: Surge in UK borrowing costs is not a repeat of the 'mini-budget' crisis, economists say
item.description: "It isn't anything like we saw with the Trussonomics mini-budget when that spike really was high after those unfunded tax cuts came in," one analyst said.

item.title: ‚ÄòAn intriguing idea:‚Äô 5 reasons we should talk about Harris‚Äôs Medicare home-care benefit
item.description: An examination of long-term care is good for all of us

item.title: U.S. economy added just 12,000 jobs in October, impacted by hurricanes, Boeing strike
item.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 100,000 in October, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

item.title: Dow jumps 400 points to start November as traders look past weak jobs report: Live updates
item.description: Stocks climbed to kick off November as Amazon led big technology stocks into the green and traders looked past a disappointing jobs report.

item.title: Wayfair customers are more price conscious, have cut spending as election nears
item.description: Wayfair‚Äôs stock turned lower as some downbeat comments about the home-goods seller‚Äôs customers followed an earnings beat.

item.title: Manchester United appoint Ruben Amorim as manager after sacking Erik ten Hag
item.description: English soccer giants Manchester United on Friday confirmed the appointment of Ruben Amorim as their new manager, shortly after sacking Erik ten Hag.

item.title: U.S. economy added just 12,000 jobs in October, impacted by hurricanes, Boeing strike

item.title: Boeing union backs sweetened contract offer that could end strike, sets vote for Monday
item.description: The unionized machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13, halting most of Boeing's aircraft production.

item.title: Manchester United appoint Ruben Amorim as manager after sacking Erik ten Hag
item.description: English soccer giants Manchester United on Friday confirmed the appointment of Ruben Amorim as their new manager, shortly after sacking Erik ten Hag.
